paris.name: Paris, France
paris.description: The City of Light awaits with its iconic landmarks, world-class museums, charming caf√©s, and romantic atmosphere. Paris seamlessly blends historic architecture with modern sophistication, offering visitors an unforgettable experience filled with art, culture, and culinary delights.
highlights: Eiffel Tower - Iconic iron lattice tower and symbol of Paris
Louvre Museum - World's largest art museum with the Mona Lisa
Notre-Dame Cathedral - Gothic masterpiece on √éle de la Cit√©
Champs-√âlys√©es - Famous avenue for shopping and dining
Montmartre - Artistic district with Sacr√©-C≈ìur Basilica

quickFacts.bestTime: April to June, September to October

activities.name: Seine River Cruise
activities.description: Romantic boat cruise along the Seine with views of iconic landmarks

activities.name: Louvre Museum Tour
activities.description: Skip-the-line guided tour of the world's most famous museum

activities.name: Eiffel Tower Experience
activities.description: Visit all levels of the Eiffel Tower with stunning city views

activities.name: Montmartre Walking Tour
activities.description: Explore the artistic heart of Paris with local guide

tokyo.name: Tokyo, Japan
tokyo.description: Experience the perfect blend of traditional culture and modern innovation in Japan's bustling capital. Tokyo offers everything from ancient temples and serene gardens to cutting-edge technology, incredible cuisine, and vibrant nightlife.
highlights: Senso-ji Temple - Tokyo's oldest Buddhist temple in Asakusa
Shibuya Crossing - World's busiest pedestrian crossing
Tokyo Skytree - Tallest structure in Japan with panoramic views
Tsukiji Outer Market - Fresh seafood and street food paradise
Meiji Shrine - Peaceful Shinto shrine in the heart of the city

quickFacts.bestTime: March to May, September to November

activities.name: Sushi Making Class
activities.description: Learn to make authentic sushi from a professional chef

activities.name: Tokyo City Tour
activities.description: Full day tour covering major attractions and hidden gems

activities.name: Traditional Tea Ceremony
activities.description: Experience authentic Japanese tea ceremony in traditional setting

activities.name: Robot Restaurant Show
activities.description: Unique entertainment experience with robots and neon lights

newYork.name: New York City, USA
newYork.description: New York City, the city that never sleeps, is a global hub of art, culture, fashion, and finance. From iconic skyscrapers to diverse neighborhoods, it offers an unmatched urban experience with endless possibilities.
highlights: Statue of Liberty - Symbol of freedom and democracy
Times Square - The crossroads of the world
Central Park - Urban oasis in the heart of Manhattan
Empire State Building - Iconic Art Deco skyscraper
Broadway Shows - World-class theater and entertainment

quickFacts.bestTime: April to June, September to November

activities.name: Broadway Show Experience
activities.description: Premium seats for a Broadway musical with backstage tour

activities.name: Statue of Liberty Tour
activities.description: Ferry tour to Liberty Island and Ellis Island

activities.name: Central Park Bike Tour
activities.description: Guided bicycle tour of Central Park highlights

activities.name: NYC Food Tour
activities.description: Taste diverse cuisines across NYC neighborhoods

bali.name: Bali, Indonesia
bali.description: Tropical paradise with stunning beaches, lush rice terraces, ancient temples, and rich cultural heritage. Bali offers the perfect blend of relaxation and adventure, from world-class surfing to spiritual retreats.
highlights: Tanah Lot Temple - Iconic sea temple on a rock formation
Ubud Rice Terraces - UNESCO World Heritage rice paddies
Mount Batur - Active volcano perfect for sunrise hikes
Seminyak Beach - Trendy beach with great surfing
Monkey Forest Sanctuary - Sacred forest with playful macaques

activities.name: Mount Batur Sunrise Hike
activities.description: Trek to the summit for breathtaking volcanic sunrise views

activities.name: Cultural Experience Tour
activities.description: Visit traditional villages and learn about Balinese culture

activities.name: Surfing Lesson
activities.description: Professional surfing instruction at Seminyak Beach

activities.name: Spa Retreat
activities.description: Traditional Balinese massage and wellness treatments

swissAlps.name: Swiss Alps, Switzerland
swissAlps.description: Breathtaking mountain views and world-class skiing adventures await in the Swiss Alps. Experience pristine alpine landscapes, charming mountain villages, and outdoor activities year-round.
highlights: Matterhorn - Iconic pyramid-shaped mountain peak
Jungfraujoch - Top of Europe with glaciers and snow
Lake Geneva - Beautiful alpine lake with vineyards
Zermatt Village - Car-free mountain resort town
Rhine Falls - Europe's most powerful waterfall

quickFacts.bestTime: December to March (skiing), June to September (hiking)

activities.name: Jungfraujoch Glacier Tour
activities.description: Train journey to Europe's highest railway station

activities.name: Skiing Adventure
activities.description: Professional skiing lessons and mountain runs

activities.name: Alpine Hiking Tour
activities.description: Scenic hikes through Swiss mountain trails

activities.name: Chocolate Making Class
activities.description: Learn to make Swiss chocolate in a traditional factory

tuscany.name: Tuscany, Italy
tuscany.description: Rolling hills, vineyards, and authentic Italian cuisine define this enchanting region. Tuscany offers Renaissance art, medieval towns, world-renowned wines, and some of the most beautiful countryside in the world.
highlights: Florence Cathedral - Stunning Renaissance architecture
Chianti Wine Region - World-famous vineyards and tastings
Pisa's Leaning Tower - Iconic tilted bell tower
Siena Historic Center - Medieval city with Gothic architecture
Val d'Orcia - UNESCO World Heritage landscape

quickFacts.bestTime: April to June, September to October

activities.name: Chianti Wine Tour
activities.description: Visit traditional wineries and taste world-class Chianti wines

activities.name: Cooking Class
activities.description: Learn to cook authentic Tuscan dishes with local chef

activities.name: Florence Art Tour
activities.description: Explore Renaissance masterpieces in the Uffizi Gallery

activities.name: Countryside Bike Tour
activities.description: Cycle through picturesque Tuscan hills and villages

london.name: London, UK
london.description: London, a city where history meets modernity, offers a unique blend of royal heritage, world-class museums, diverse culture, and innovative architecture. Experience the charm of this global metropolis along the River Thames.
highlights: Big Ben & Houses of Parliament
Tower of London
Buckingham Palace
British Museum
London Eye

activities.name: Royal Palace Tour
activities.description: Visit Buckingham Palace and learn about royal history

activities.name: Museum Day Pass
activities.description: Access to major London museums and galleries

activities.name: Thames River Cruise
activities.description: Scenic boat cruise along the River Thames

activities.name: Street Food Market Tour
activities.description: Explore London's diverse food markets and cuisines

costaRica.name: Costa Rica
costaRica.description: Rich biodiversity and stunning natural landscapes make Costa Rica a paradise for nature lovers. From pristine beaches to lush rainforests, this Central American gem offers incredible wildlife and adventure activities.
highlights: Manuel Antonio National Park - Beaches and wildlife
Arenal Volcano - Active volcano with hot springs
Monteverde Cloud Forest - Unique ecosystem with zip-lining
Tortuguero National Park - Sea turtle nesting site
Tamarindo Beach - World-class surfing destination

activities.name: Zip-lining Adventure
activities.description: Soar through the canopy on thrilling zip-line courses

activities.name: Wildlife Safari
activities.description: Spot sloths, monkeys, and exotic birds in their natural habitat

activities.name: Volcano Hike
activities.description: Hike around active Arenal Volcano with stunning views

activities.name: White Water Rafting
activities.description: Navigate exciting rapids through tropical rainforest

santorini.name: Santorini, Greece
santorini.description: Iconic white buildings and spectacular sunsets make Santorini one of the world's most romantic destinations. This volcanic island offers stunning caldera views, unique beaches, and exceptional wines.
highlights: Oia Village - Famous for spectacular sunsets
Red Beach - Unique red volcanic sand beach
Akrotiri Archaeological Site - Ancient Minoan city
Fira Town - Capital with stunning caldera views
Santo Wines Winery - Volcanic soil wine tasting

activities.name: Sunset Sailing Tour
activities.description: Sail around the caldera with dinner and sunset views

activities.name: Wine Tasting Tour
activities.description: Taste unique volcanic wines at traditional wineries

activities.name: Volcano Excursion
activities.description: Boat trip to active volcanic islands in the caldera

activities.name: Photography Tour
activities.description: Capture the most Instagram-worthy spots with professional guide

iceland.name: Iceland
iceland.description: Land of fire and ice with stunning waterfalls, geysers, and northern lights. Iceland offers dramatic landscapes, from glacial lagoons to volcanic fields, making it a photographer's paradise and nature lover's dream destination.
highlights: Blue Lagoon - Geothermal spa with milky blue waters
Golden Circle - Geysir, Gullfoss waterfall, and √ûingvellir National Park
Northern Lights - Aurora borealis viewing from September to March
J√∂kuls√°rl√≥n Glacier Lagoon - Icebergs floating in glacial lake
Reynisfjara Black Sand Beach - Dramatic volcanic beach with basalt columns

quickFacts.bestTime: June to August (summer), September to March (Northern Lights)

activities.name: Northern Lights Tour
activities.description: Hunt for the magical aurora borealis with expert guides

activities.name: Golden Circle Tour
activities.description: Visit Iceland's most famous natural attractions in one day

activities.name: Blue Lagoon Experience
activities.description: Relax in the famous geothermal spa with silica mud masks

activities.name: Glacier Hiking
activities.description: Explore ancient glaciers with crampons and ice axes

barcelona.name: Barcelona, Spain
barcelona.description: Gaudi's architectural masterpieces, vibrant culture, and Mediterranean beaches make Barcelona a perfect blend of art, history, and modern life. From the Gothic Quarter to Park G√ºell, every corner tells a story.
highlights: Sagrada Familia - Gaudi's unfinished masterpiece basilica
Park G√ºell - Colorful mosaic park with city views
Las Ramblas - Famous pedestrian street with street performers
Gothic Quarter - Medieval streets and historic architecture
Casa Batll√≥ - Modernist building with unique facade

quickFacts.bestTime: May to June, September to October

activities.name: Sagrada Familia Tour
activities.description: Skip-the-line tour of Gaudi's architectural masterpiece

activities.name: Tapas Walking Tour
activities.description: Taste authentic Spanish tapas in local neighborhoods

activities.name: Flamenco Show
activities.description: Experience passionate flamenco dancing and music

activities.name: Gothic Quarter Walking Tour
activities.description: Explore medieval streets and hidden squares

dubai.name: Dubai, UAE
dubai.description: Luxury shopping, ultramodern architecture, and desert adventures in the Middle East. Dubai offers world-class attractions, from the tallest building to artificial islands, blending tradition with futuristic innovation.
highlights: Burj Khalifa - World's tallest building with observation decks
Dubai Mall - Massive shopping center with aquarium and ice rink
Palm Jumeirah - Artificial island with luxury resorts
Dubai Marina - Stunning waterfront with skyscrapers
Gold Souk - Traditional market for gold and jewelry

activities.name: Burj Khalifa Experience
activities.description: Visit the world's tallest building and observation deck

activities.name: Desert Safari
activities.description: Dune bashing, camel riding, and traditional Bedouin dinner

activities.name: Dubai Marina Cruise
activities.description: Luxury yacht cruise with stunning skyline views

activities.name: Shopping Tour
activities.description: Explore traditional souks and modern shopping malls

goa.name: Goa, India
goa.description: Beautiful beaches, Portuguese architecture, and vibrant nightlife in India's coastal paradise. Goa offers a unique blend of Indian and Portuguese cultures, with stunning beaches and laid-back atmosphere.
highlights: Baga Beach - Popular beach with water sports and nightlife
Old Goa Churches - UNESCO World Heritage Portuguese churches
Anjuna Flea Market - Vibrant market with local crafts and food
Dudhsagar Falls - Spectacular four-tiered waterfall
Spice Plantations - Aromatic tours through cardamom and pepper farms

activities.name: Beach Hopping Tour
activities.description: Visit multiple beaches from Baga to Palolem with lunch

activities.name: Spice Plantation Tour
activities.description: Learn about spice cultivation with traditional Goan lunch

activities.name: Water Sports Package
activities.description: Parasailing, jet skiing, and banana boat rides

activities.name: Old Goa Heritage Tour
activities.description: Explore Portuguese colonial architecture and churches

features.headerDescription: From intelligent route planning to community-driven insights, we've built the ultimate travel management platform for modern explorers.

routePlanner.title: Interactive Route Planner
routePlanner.description: Plan your perfect journey with real-time traffic, waypoints, and alternative route suggestions.

community.title: Travel Community
community.description: Share stories, tips, and photos with fellow travelers. Join discussions and get insider advice.

aiAssistant.title: AI Travel Assistant
aiAssistant.description: Get instant help with bookings, FAQs, and personalized travel recommendations.

notifications.title: Smart Notifications
notifications.description: Real-time alerts for bookings, cancellations, reminders, and exclusive travel offers.

multiLang.title: Multi-Language Support
multiLang.description: Access the platform in your preferred language with comprehensive translation support.

darkMode.title: Dark Mode
darkMode.description: Switch between light and dark themes for comfortable viewing in any lighting condition.

features.ctaDescription: Join millions of travelers who trust TravelHub for their adventures. Plan smarter, travel better, and create unforgettable memories.
